name: Sentinel Rift Demo
description:
Sentinel Rift is a 2d action rpg featuring a unique plot and combat system. The game is played in a vast kingdom with many different biomes. In this demo, you are able to explore the majority of the forest biome as well as a tutorial dungeon and village.
